position: Product Manager | Leading Product 0 to 1 | B2C | B2B

experience.title: Product Analyst
experience.description: Utilize expertise in product analysis, management consulting, and user experience (UX) to drive the success of InstaAstro's products.Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify opportunities and gather requirements for product development.Conduct in-depth market research, competitive analysis, and user feedback analysis to inform product strategies and roadmaps.Leverage wireframing and prototyping tools to create intuitive and user-friendly interfaces for new features and product enhancements.Work closely with the operations management team to ensure seamless product implementation and delivery.
experience.description_html: Utilize expertise in product analysis, management consulting, and user experience (UX) to drive the success of InstaAstro's products.Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify opportunities and gather requirements for product development.Conduct in-depth market research, competitive analysis, and user feedback analysis to inform product strategies and roadmaps.Leverage wireframing and prototyping tools to create intuitive and user-friendly interfaces for new features and product enhancements.Work closely with the operations management team to ensure seamless product implementation and delivery.

positions.subtitle: IBC Media
positions.description: As a Web3 Product Manager at IBC Media, I drive the development and launch of innovative web3 products that enhance the online experience for our customers. Key responsibilities and achievements include:Lead cross-functional teams in defining product strategies, conducting market research, and identifying opportunities for web3 product development.Develop and manage product roadmaps, ensuring alignment with company goals, customer needs, and emerging industry trends.Collaborate closely with engineering, design, and marketing teams to execute product development and launch plans.Conduct user research and gather feedback to continuously enhance the user experience and drive product improvements.Implement agile methodologies, enabling efficient product development and iterative improvements.Stay up-to-date with the latest web3 technologies, industry trends, and competitive landscape to drive innovation and maintain a competitive edge.
positions.title: Associate Product Manager Intern
positions.description_html:
As a Web3 Product Manager at IBC Media, I drive the development and launch of innovative web3 products that enhance the online experience for our customers. Key responsibilities and achievements include:

Lead cross-functional teams in defining product strategies, conducting market research, and identifying opportunities for web3 product development.

Develop and manage product roadmaps, ensuring alignment with company goals, customer needs, and emerging industry trends.

Collaborate closely with engineering, design, and marketing teams to execute product development and launch plans.

Conduct user research and gather feedback to continuously enhance the user experience and drive product improvements.

Implement agile methodologies, enabling efficient product development and iterative improvements.
Stay up-to-date with the latest web3 technologies, industry trends, and competitive landscape to drive innovation and maintain a competitive edge.

experience.title: Product Management Intern
experience.description: Conducted comprehensive product analysis, gathering insights from market research, user feedback, and competitor analysis to inform product strategy and decision-making.Collaborated closely with cross-functional teams, including engineering, design, and marketing, to define product requirements and prioritize feature development based on user needs and business goals.Assisted in wireframing and prototyping user interfaces to improve user experience (UX) and ensure seamless navigation and functionality.Supported operations management by coordinating with internal stakeholders to streamline processes and improve efficiency in product development and delivery.Contributed to management consulting activities, providing insights and recommendations to improve product performance and drive growth.Actively participated in product development cycles, conducting user testing and gathering feedback to iteratively enhance product features and functionality.Developed a strong understanding of user-centric design principles and applied them to optimize the user experience (UX) and overall product value.Collaborated with the product management team in the end-to-end product development process, from ideation and concept validation to launch and post-launch monitoring.
experience.description_html: Conducted comprehensive product analysis, gathering insights from market research, user feedback, and competitor analysis to inform product strategy and decision-making.Collaborated closely with cross-functional teams, including engineering, design, and marketing, to define product requirements and prioritize feature development based on user needs and business goals.Assisted in wireframing and prototyping user interfaces to improve user experience (UX) and ensure seamless navigation and functionality.Supported operations management by coordinating with internal stakeholders to streamline processes and improve efficiency in product development and delivery.Contributed to management consulting activities, providing insights and recommendations to improve product performance and drive growth.Actively participated in product development cycles, conducting user testing and gathering feedback to iteratively enhance product features and functionality.Developed a strong understanding of user-centric design principles and applied them to optimize the user experience (UX) and overall product value.Collaborated with the product management team in the end-to-end product development process, from ideation and concept validation to launch and post-launch monitoring.
